mapper.select: /* proMapper.selectProNoticeList 프로 특이사항 목록 조회 */ SELECT M.MS_NUM , M.MS_NAME , MS_IMAGENAME , NOTICE_DIV , PRO_MUST_YN , (CASE WHEN (PRO_REMARK LIKE '%https://%') THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(PRO_REMARK, '/', -1) ELSE PRO_REMARK END) AS PRO_REMARK , NOTICE_OPEN_YN FROM PRO_NOTICE N INNER JOIN DR_MS_MAININFO M ON N.MS_NUM = M.MS_NUM WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.MS_NUM = ${msNum} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(M.MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N'

/* proMapper.selectProNoticeOpenList 공개 처리된 프로 특이사항 목록 조회 */ SELECT M.MS_NUM , M.MS_NAME , MS_IMAGENAME , NOTICE_DIV , PRO_MUST_YN , (CASE WHEN (PRO_REMARK LIKE '%https://%') THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(PRO_REMARK, '/', -1) ELSE PRO_REMARK END) AS PRO_REMARK , NOTICE_OPEN_YN FROM PRO_NOTICE N INNER JOIN DR_MS_MAININFO M ON N.MS_NUM = M.MS_NUM WHERE 1 = 1 AND NULLIF(N.PRO_REMARK, '') IS NOT null AND NOTICE_OPEN_YN != 'N' AND M.MS_NUM = ${msNum} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(M.MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N'

/* proMapper.selectProNotice 프로 특이사항 단일 조회 */ SELECT M.MS_NUM , M.MS_NAME , MS_IMAGENAME , NOTICE_DIV , PRO_MUST_YN , PRO_REMARK , NOTICE_OPEN_YN FROM PRO_NOTICE N INNER JOIN DR_MS_MAININFO M ON N.MS_NUM = M.MS_NUM WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.MS_NUM = #{msNum} AND NOTICE_DIV = #{noticeDiv} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(M.MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' LIMIT 1

/* proMapper.selectProImageList 프로 갤러리 이미지/영상 목록 조회 */ SELECT MS_NUM , IMG_DIV , IMG_SEQ , IMG_PATH , IMG_FILENAME , IMG_DATA FROM PRO_IMAGE WHERE 1 = 1 AND IMG_PATH NOT LIKE '%profile%' AND MS_NUM = #{msNum}

/* proMapper.selectProLicenseList 프로 자격증 목록 조회 */ SELECT M.MS_NUM , M.MS_NAME , LIC_SEQ , LIC_KIND , LIC_REMARK , CD_TITLE1 AS LIC_NAME , LIC_OPEN_YN FROM PRO_LICENSE L INNER JOIN DR_MS_MAININFO M ON M.MS_NUM = L.MS_NUM INNER JOIN CD_COMMON C ON C.CD_CODE = L.LIC_KIND AND C.CD_DIVISION = '018' WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.MS_NUM = #{msNum} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(M.MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' ORDER BY CD_SORT
/* proMapper.selectProLicense 프로 자격증 단일 조회 */ SELECT LIC_SEQ , MS_NUM , LIC_KIND , LIC_REMARK , LIC_OPEN_YN FROM PRO_LICENSE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MS_NUM = #{msNum} AND LIC_KIND = #{licKind}
